item.title: 👨‍💻Why No Coders Should Consider Understanding Code (A Bit)
item.description: The nocode plane is clearly moving up and you’ve probably already heard about it and started working with some of the tools Google Trends “nocode” search term over the last 4 years setting higher lows showing an upward momentum trend. Especially over the past year. You’ve probably got along with your favorite no-code tool and know how to create websites or dynamic online lists without writing a line of code.
